A4.text: The Eagles ultimately lost to the Chiefs by a score of 38–35.

A5.text: The Eagles traveled to Minneapolis to compete in Super Bowl LII, their third attempt at a title.

A6.text: The underdog Eagles defeated the Patriots with a score of 41–33 to win their first Super Bowl and their first NFL title since 1960.

A7.text: The game was played on February 4, 2018, at U.S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
